text: Raphael is one of the four Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. He is the brawn of the group of brothers and uses sais. He is also known as the Nightwatcher. ==Portrayals== Raphael has been played by Nolan North in movies based on TMNT. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1984 Category:Fictional turtles Category:Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles characters
title: Raphael (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles)
